title: Reza Moradi CV
text:
Computer Science Student | Software Developer

mohammadrezamoradi382@gmail.com | LinkedIn | (208) 500-2821 | United States



Bachelor’s Degree – Computer Science student at Brigham Young University–Idaho


Cross-platform software development, database systems, backend APIs, and real-time web applications



Web development, mobile apps, machine learning, backend architecture, educational platforms




Programming Languages: Python, HTML, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, JSON, Erlang, C#, Java, Kotlin
Platforms: Mac, Windows, Linux, Android, iOS, GCP, Firebase, NODE.JS
Tools & Libraries: TensorFlow, PyTorch, GitHub, Pandas, YAML, Regex, Pycharm, SSH/DCN, SFTP, VNC, mySQL, MongoDB, Mongoose, Express.js
Communication: Strong written and verbal communication skills. Fluent in English, Farsi, Dari, Tajik, Arabic, Azerbaijani, Turkish, Slovak, Czech



2023 – Present
Arabic Language TA, Brigham Young University–Idaho, Idaho
- Provide academic support for Arabic courses
- Facilitate language learning and cultural awareness
- Assist professors with instruction and university events
2018 – 2021
Technical Service Trainee, Appliance Repair, Iran
- Diagnosed and repaired motors, boards, and appliances
- Demonstrated precision in disassembly and repairs
- Strengthened critical thinking and system analysis skills
June – Dec 2018
Technical Trainee, Signal Center, Qazvin, Iran
- Specialized in mobile device repairs
- Performed socket/screen replacements and updates
- Developed hardware and software troubleshooting expertise





A real-time messaging platform to discuss astronomy and space exploration

Stack: Firebase, Firestore, Firebase Auth

Features: Secure user accounts, real-time chat, photo sharing

Design: Clean, user-friendly interface focused on engagement

Outcome: A safe platform for space enthusiasts to interact and learn





2023 – 2026 (expected)
Brigham Young University–Idaho, Rexburg, Idaho
- Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science
Certifications:
- Responsive Web Design
- Relational Databases
- Backend Development and APIs
